definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
mendicant religious order in Catholicism/Franciscan order

sentences.english: Poor Clare Nuns attempted to repair this damage with patches.
sentences.chinese: 可憐的克萊爾修會修女嘗試去修復這個肖像。

sentences.english: I am sure this picture of Mr. Reid kneeling in prayer was taken at one of Calvary's camps or retreats.
sentences.chinese: 李牧師跪下祈禱的照片是在夏令會或退修會拍下。

sentences.english: Does the Priory of Sion really exist?
sentences.chinese: 峋山隱修會真的存在嗎？

sentences.english: People in some religious orders take a vow of celibacy.
sentences.chinese: 有些宗教修會的人發誓不結婚。

sentences.english: Yes, but not as described by Brown.
sentences.chinese: 峋山隱修會真的存在，但並不像布朗所描述的那樣。

sentences.english: Some of Angela's followers became known as the Order of Saint Ursula.
sentences.chinese: 部分安琪的追隨者後來成了聖吳蘇樂修會。

sentences.english: The retreat was customized for full time caregivers from various Christian social ministries.
sentences.chinese: 此退修會特爲關懷機構的全時間同工而量身設計的。

sentences.english: And he was a Grand Master of the Priory of Sion.
sentences.chinese: 他還是位郇山隱修會的大師。

sentences.english: Church Retreat is less than two months away.
sentences.chinese: 尚有不到兩個月退修會就來到了。

definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
